results.title: AHA Leadership Summit Focuses on Innovation and Policy Impacts
results.summary: The 2025 AHA Leadership Summit addressed advancements in patient care and challenges in healthcare policy. Rick Pollack emphasized innovation through shared ideas and the AHA's advocacy for vulnerable populations. Tina Freese Decker urged collaborative efforts to transform healthcare for long-term sustainability. The summit highlighted discussions on care delivery, workforce, and technology.

title: AHA Leadership Summit Focuses on Innovation and Policy Impacts
